TopicTitle: Why did we build it when we didn't use it???

Articles.Content:
Hello Community-Members,

new day, new Challenge!!

Every start I see the runway near the Space Center and think 'Hey why did they build it, because i never use it'

My Challenge is to land on the runway by using the C7-Parts. When it\'s too easy make one Orbit and land.

I want an Video of the SUCCESSFULLY landing

NO VERTICAL PARACHUTE LANDINGS

PARACHUTES TO MAKE YOUR AIRCRAFT SLOWER ARE ALLOWED
Much more difficult with 0.11 than with previous versions, especially with all the buggy behaviour in stalling and lack of any soft ground at the moment.
Nah, easy enough, I\'ve made landings with some behemoth planes without shutes, sadly, my computer doesn\'t like fraps and KSP running together
Better challenge: use the top of the VAB as a helipad.

A lot of people use the runway right now. Normally in combination with the C7 flight pack.

In future editions the runway will be more useful, have proper markings, and possibly have horizontal take off options.

My completely uneducated guess is after .12 and the moon that hopefully the runway and horizontal take off (and 'pick-a-pod') will be started for .13
I can\'t wait for runways on the moon
